# Gallery

This gallery shows advanced `tinytable` examples. A link to the full code and data required to reproduce the full HTML tables is given above each screenshot.

## Wines

Original table designed by [Abdoul Madjid](https://www.abdoulblog.com), who created the first version in `gt` format for the RStudio Table Contest. Code and data for the `tinytable` translation are [available on Github.](https://github.com/vincentarelbundock/tinytable/tree/main/gallery/wines)

![](figures/gallery_wines.png){fig-alt="Table showing a list of wines with various attributes including price, rating, and origin."}
